title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, I hear a Windows 'ding' sound.
EB: I expect that when I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, there should be no audible feedback or sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ControlExampleText.
2. Choose SWT.MULTI
3. Observe that a Windows 'ding' sound is heard.
